title: does anyone else smell Vainglory on this nexus blitz map?
body: Vainglory did say they are trialing their map and what not on PC's atm and i wonder if they are doing this with ties to league?

replies.body:
Honestly, I got a real Heroes of the Storm vibe from reading about the Nexus Blitz mode. Really seems, to me, like someone at Riot has taken inspiration from HotS for the concept.

Hadn't heard of Vainglory before today, though.
